name: Careful Collector
description:
Have you ever played pass with an egg before? Sounds like a mess, right? Well now you can have that fun without getting all eggy! Use your mouse to VERY GENTLY catch the eggs. Once in your basket, fling the egg to the right side of the scene (there's thousands of pillows just off-screen.) The game is endless, so try to get the highest score possible!

This prototype was created in less than 4 hours in one day. 

Theme was "Easter"

Constraints were: 

Must have an easter egg

2d

Colourful

In-Browser (lol)
